K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-16: sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i cha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-17: cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-18: dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-19: sgo khyud der ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-20: sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-21: snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-22: dgu cha ru ni rnam bgos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-23: grva yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-24: tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-25: dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-26: kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-27: gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-28: lta ba lnga po bgrod dka' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-29: kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-30: sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-31: sa ni tshon gyis rab tu bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-32: dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-33: sangs rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-34: kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:12b-35: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-3: dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-5: rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-6: mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-7: rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-10: sems can kun gyi don du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-11: 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-14: chos kyi ye shes las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-15: chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-18: sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-19: byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-20: dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-21: nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-22: shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-23: lho ru ser po yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-24: nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-25: byang du ljang dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-26: kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-27: sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-28: gang zhig dbus mar yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-29: sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-30: gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-31: ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-32: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-0: @13b sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-1: spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-2: bzhin bzang spyan ni yangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-3: nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-4: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-5: bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-6: phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-7: khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-8: dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-9: 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-10: nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-11: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-12: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-13: nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-14: zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-16: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-17: nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-18: phyag tu autpal sngo dmar ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-19: khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-21: gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-22: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chud par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-23: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-24: sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-25: rdo rje chos mar rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-26: mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-27: padma r'a ga lta bu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-28: sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-30: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:13b-31: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-3: chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-4: gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-5: mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-7: sangs rgyas gzugs na rnam bsgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-8: sgrol ma mchog ni bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-9: zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-10: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-11: kha dog ser po nyid bsam zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-12: bud med sgyu ma'i dregs por ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-13: phyag tu autpala dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-14: ser po snang ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-15: rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-16: sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-17: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la ti shtha siddha lo tsa ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-18: sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-19: aom sham ka re sh'anti ka re ghutta ghu tti ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-20: gh'a ta ya gh'a t aya ghu tti ni svah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-21: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka re sva'ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-22: tom t'a re tu tta re tu re sv'aha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-24: sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-25: thugs ni sems kyi rnam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-26: gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-27: mchod nam chod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-28: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-29: mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-30: bsrungs na mchog tu gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-32: dngos po yongs su dag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14a-33: med pas kun tu brtag mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-0: tshogs med @14b yang dag mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-1: de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-4: ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-5: chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-6: dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-7: ji ltar lha yi nor bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-8: rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-9: srid pa yongs su dag pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-11: rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-12: gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-13: thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-14: mkhas pas de la bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-15: thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so ///
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma k'a ra ba rma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-001:14b-17: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
